org.apache.karaf.features.internal.service

Class RepositoryCacheImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.features.internal.service.RepositoryCacheImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryCache

    public class RepositoryCacheImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RepositoryCache
    Implementation of RepositoryCache that makes use of FeaturesProcessor to alter feature definitions after reading them from XML file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
